reasons_to_visit.details: Milan comes alive in April with blooming flowers and vibrant parks, making it a picturesque time to explore the city's outdoor spaces.
This is the world's largest furniture fair, attracting design enthusiasts from around the globe, offering exhibitions, events, and installations across the city.
A week-long celebration of contemporary art with exhibitions, performances, and events in galleries and cultural institutions.
Experience traditional Easter events, including processions and special services, along with festive markets and unique culinary treats.
With milder temperatures compared to winter, it's ideal for sightseeing and walking tours without the summer crowds.
April is part of the opera season, providing a chance to see world-class performances at the famed Teatro alla Scala.
Enjoy the Milanese tradition of aperitivo in lively outdoor settings as locals and tourists mingle at bars and cafés.

reasons_to_reconsider.details: April can still be rainy and occasionally chilly, requiring versatile packing and potential changes in outdoor plans.
Due to major events like Salone del Mobile, hotel rates can be higher, and early booking is recommended to secure reasonable prices.
Popular sites can get busy, especially during Easter and major events, so plan visits early or during off-peak hours.
Certain outdoor activities and day trips might not be fully operational until later in spring.

weather.precipitation: April can be quite rainy, with occasional showers, so carrying an umbrella is advised.
weather.general_tips: Pack a mix of layers, including a light jacket or sweater, and waterproof shoes for rainy days.

tourism_level.crowds: Moderate, with a noticeable increase during Easter and Salone del Mobile.
tourism_level.pricing: Accommodation and flight prices are generally higher due to events and holidays.
tourism_level.overall_atmosphere: Festive and lively, with a mix of tourists and locals enjoying the city's offerings.

events_holidays.name: Salone del Mobile
events_holidays.description: An internationally renowned furniture fair with exhibitions, installations, and events throughout the city.
events_holidays.notes: Book accommodations early and consider purchasing tickets in advance.

events_holidays.name: Milan Art Week

events_holidays.notes: Plan for closures on Easter Monday, a public holiday.
